name: nrex1

body.origin:
|- wcel(cnr, universe)
-| wceq(cnr, cqs(cxp(cnp, cnp), cer))
-| wcel(cqs(cxp(cnp, cnp), cer), universe)

|- wcel(cnr, universe)

|- wcel(cnr, universe)

-| wss(cqs(cxp(cnp, cnp), cer), cpw(cxp(cnp, cnp)))

-| wss(cqs(cxp(cnp, cnp), cer), cpw(cxp(cnp, cnp)))

comment: The class of signed reals is a set. Note that a shorter proof is possible using ~ qsex (and not requiring ~ enrer ), but it would add a dependency on ~ ax-rep . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.) Extract proof from that of ~ axcnex . (Revised by BJ, 4-Feb-2023.) (New usage is discouraged.)
